com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.affine

Class RotateRightTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.AffineTransform
      • com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.affine.RotateRightTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class RotateRightTransform
extends AffineTransform
    An AffineTransform that performs a 90-degree counter-clockwise rotation around an object's center point.
    See Also:
